name: Karmzah Run (Yash Saxena)
description:
Genre: Auto-Runner Platformer

View: 3D

Player/s: Single Player

Rating: Everyone “E”

Through the combination of Farida Bedwei’s creative writing skills and Leti Arts’ artistic and technical skills, Karmzah was born. 

Karmzah Run is a 3D side-scroller platformer. It's an action auto-runner game, where you perform amazing stunts, dodge hazards and chase down enemies in a fast-paced game with new generation 3d graphics.
